entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
